snippet: A double-decker bus slammed into a bridge support pillar on Interstate 55 on Thursday, leaving at least one person dead and more than three dozen others injured, officials said.
abstract: Officials say a double-decker bus operated by discount carrier Megabus slammed into a bridge support pillar on Interstate 55 in Illinois, leaving at least one person dead and more than three dozen others injured.
lead_paragraph: A double-decker bus slammed into a bridge support pillar on Interstate 55 on Thursday, leaving at least one person dead and more than three dozen others injured, officials said.

headline.main: Illinois: Death and Injuries as Bus Hits Bridge Support
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Death and Injuries as Bus Hits Bridge Support
